resources.string: You are Bruce Wayne. It is vital that nobody suspects you to be a good enough person to actually be Batman.
Harvey Dent organised a charity gala to support victims of domestic violence. All the big names of Gotham are here! People are currently mingling in the main room before the event actually starts.

Harvey holds an opening speech. He talks about the struggle many children are going through every day, and how he experienced the pain himself. It is very moving; you here some rich people dry their tears with $100 bills..
